metadata.title: CVE-2021-3694 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: LedgerSMB does not sufficiently HTML-encode error messages sent to thebrowser. By sending a specially crafted URL to an authenticated user, thisflaw can be abused for remote code execution and information disclosure.

criterions.comment: ledgersmb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
